fields.text: Welcome to Woebot Labs, your twenty-four-seven mental health companion with a side of dorky jokes.
To explore mood-boosting strategies and chat with Woebot, press [INDEX].
To start a new mood conversation with Woebot, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to Woebot for a helpful chat.
To review your mood history and track your progress, press [INDEX].
One moment please, retrieving your mood history now.
For account management, billing, or technical assistance, press [INDEX].
For account and billing inquiries, press [INDEX].
Hang tight while we connect you to our account support team.
For technical support and app issues, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.
